titleStmt.title: A true and perfect description of the strange and wonderful she-elephant sent from the Indies, which arrived at London, August 1. 1683. With the true portraicture of that wonder in nature.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randolph Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: some lines of text failed to print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
